message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $16,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I'm interested in the product, $16,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your budget, but $16,000 is still too high. I could come down to $14,000. I believe this product will be a great investment for you, even at that price.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $14,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a price we can both agree on.
